name: It's Raining Men
description:
Mother Nature has rearranged the sky, and it's raining men (hallellujah)! You are a Weather Girl, and  the chance to find the guy of your dreams amidst the best storm ever is now!

It's Raining Men has been an important song for me throughout my life. So when the inspiration came, I decided to do something, if minuscule, to honor The Weather Girls' immortal legacy.

It's recommended to play on fullscreen mode.

CONTROLS:

  • WASD or arrows to move left and right.
  • Space to jump.
  • You'll get higher scores the lower you catch the guys!

CREDITS:

  • Character Art: Kenney's Free Assets.
  • Background Art: Pixel Night City, from fridaruiz in OpenGameArt.
  • Music: It's Raining Men - 8 bit, from8BitUzz (permission was asked).
  • Thud sound: "Body Thud" by Kane53126 in Freesound.
  • All coding and the logo are made by me.
  • All rights are property of their rightful owners.

DEV NOTES:

I sadly started running out of time before I could change the main menu design or implement another player sprite. I wanted to introduce a male sprite because some of us grew up in the 90's imagining that Mother Nature would also throw a man our way.

I also deliberately made this game so you couldn't lose.

ADDITIONAL NOTES:

A few friends have also joined this jam. Please take a look at their games:

  • Playing Under Storm, by Samuel Reyes.
  • Be The Storm, by KRG Code.
  • Warlock and the Storm, by Jose Moyano.
